Given these serious health risks, it is irresponsible to continue adding fluoride to our drinking water. In light of the scientific evidence, I firmly believe that the practice of water fluoridation must be halted to protect public health. The risks are simply too great, and the benefits too small, to justify the continued addition of fluoride to our drinking water.
